content: knitted drops men s hat with norwegian pattern in karisma drops extra 0-810 drops design pattern no u-651 yarn group b size s/m - l/xl head circumference approx 54/55 - 56/58 cm / 21 /21½ - 22 /23 materials drops karisma from garnstudio 100 g for both sizes in color no 37 dark gray blue 50 g for both sizes in color no 55 light beige brown drops double pointed needles and circular needle 40 cm / 16 size 4 mm / us 6 - or size needed to get 21 sts x 28 row in stockinette st = 10 x 10 cm / 4 x 4 drops circular needle size 3 mm / us 2or3 40 cm / 16 - for rib worked in the round on circular needle switch to double pointed needles when needed uk version 1 1 http //www garnstudio com/pattern php id=5454&cid=19
